issue.title: [Gandiva][Crossbow] Turn parquet encryption off
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5443](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5443). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Turn off Parquet Encryption for Gandiva crossbow, since it pulls in additional dependencies that is not required/present currently.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5443?focusedCommentId=16851617) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
